titleStmt.title: A model of private prayers or, occasional helps in retired devotions. / Composed by Edward Wolley, D.D. chaplain in ordinary to his Majesty.
titleStmt.author: Wolley, Edward, 1603-1684.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.R. and are to be sold by William Palmer, at the sign of the Palm-tree in Fleet-street, and at the Gun in St. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: First word of title in Greek characters.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Bound following: The parents blessing their children, and the children begging (on their knees) their parents blessings... .

place.placeName: the Gun in St. Pauls Church-yard
the sign of the Palm-tree in Fleet-street
